recipesJson.name: Love like Rye:  A Rhubarb Strawberry Cream
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
**Love like Rye**  Dedicated to Vape Rye 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znVKUMZ-MIo
A Strawberry and Rhubarb Cream. 
Vaping this is like that feeling you first get, you know when you meet that someone, and you are 'In Love'. .
The base is a combination of the Cheesecake from the **WF Strawberry Cheesecake**,  **DV Rhubarb Cuddle** (this has DV Cream Anglais in the concentrate),  and **Cap Vanilla Whipped Cream**.  
The **WF Juicy Strawberry** is backing up the Strawberry Cheesecake,  and the **WF Sweet and Sour Rhubarb**  boosts the Rhubarb in the Cuddle.  
Just yummy  
Ωhm Grown Alchemy https://www.facebook.com/groups/ohmgrownalchemy/
Mixing in the Kitchen https://www.facebook.com/groups/425650464915364/

reviews.text: 5 stars alone for the reason this was created and the dedication to Vape Rye. Great Job Tam.
